name: ContentCanary
0:
”Alexa, open content canary”
”Alexa, start content canary”
”Alexa, ask content canary for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: content canary
des:
Ask Alexa to open content canary. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill will simply list content ideas, until you are satisfied with the idea or want to hear more.
If you would like to hear more content ideas, simply ask for more or say "sure"
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
